definition.name: website

definition.description: Connect to your cluster using dnsName.location.cloudapp.azure.com
Name of the Network Interface
This prefix is used for names which need to be globally unique.
public IP name for MySQL loadbalancer
The location/region where the virtual network is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
Resource group name into which your Spark and Cassandra deployment will go.
Name of the Storage Account
Storage account Tier for the cluster (e.g. Standard or Premium)
Storage account replication type for the cluster (e.g. LRS, GRS etc)
IP address in CIDR for db subnet
subnet name for the MySQL nodes
website host plan
MySQL public port
wordpress site name
Website sku. Allowed values: Basic, Standard, Premium
Website worker size. Allowed values: 0, 1, 2
VM OS name
publisher for the VM OS image
version of the image to apply (az vm image list)

Specify an admin password that should be used to login to the VM. Must be between 6-72 characters long and must satisfy at least 3 of password complexity requirements from the following: 1) Contains an uppercase character 2) Contains a lowercase character 3) Contains a numeric digit 4) Contains a special character
Specify an admin username that should be used to login to the VM. Min length: 1
size for the VMs
The base URI where artifacts required by this template are located.
The directory and script which will configure MySQL
The directory and script which will be called in the extension for the MySQL config
mysql probe password
mysql replication user password
mysql root user password
New or Existing Virtual network name for the cluster
IP address in CIDR for virtual network
Start IP address for the VMs in db subnet
VM OS version. Allowed values: 6.5, 6.6
MySQL public port
MySQL public port master
MySQL public port slave
the name of the offer (az vm image list)
name of the publisher of the image (az vm image list)
public ssh port for VM1
public ssh port for VM2
If using existing VNet, specifies the resource group for the existing VNet
Identifies whether to use new or existing Virtual Network
